name: Nhà Công Tử Bạc Liêu
description: The Mansion of the Bac Lieu Lord is an iconic historical house associated with the wealth and influence of the Bac Lieu aristocracy.

name: Chùa Xiêm Cán
description: Xiêm Cán Pagoda is an important religious and cultural landmark in Bac Lieu, known for its traditional architecture.

name: Vườn chim Bạc Liêu
description: Bac Lieu Bird Garden is a sanctuary for various species of birds and offers an opportunity to experience the region's rich biodiversity.

name: Cánh đồng quạt gió Bạc Liêu
description: Bac Lieu Wind Farm is an impressive wind power project, the largest in the Mekong Delta, known for its wind turbines.

name: Biển Bạc Liêu
description: Bac Lieu Beach is a peaceful coastal destination with soft sand and clear water, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

name: Chùa Vĩnh Nghi
description: Vĩnh Nghi Pagoda is a serene Buddhist temple that attracts visitors with its calm atmosphere and beautiful architecture.

name: Tháp Vĩnh Nghi
description: The Vinh Nghi Tower is a historic landmark with great cultural significance, offering views of the surrounding landscape.

name: Khu du lịch sinh thái Hồ Nam
description: The Hồ Nam Ecotourism Area offers a chance to explore nature through hiking, bird-watching, and enjoying the surrounding wetlands.

name: Nhà thờ Tắc Sậy
description: Tắc Sậy Church is a historic Catholic church that holds cultural and spiritual importance for the local community.

name: Chùa Ghositaram
description: Ghositaram Pagoda is a beautiful Buddhist temple in Bạc Liêu with unique architectural features and peaceful surroundings.

name: Chùa Phật Bà Nam Hải
description: The Nam Hai Goddess Pagoda is an important Buddhist temple, known for its statue of the Goddess of Mercy.

name: Khu lưu niệm nhạc sĩ Cao Văn Lầu
description: The Cao Văn Lầu Memorial is dedicated to the life and work of the famous Vietnamese musician and composer.

name: Đình Bình Thạnh
description: Bình Thạnh Communal House is a traditional structure that hosts local festivals and cultural ceremonies.

name: Chùa Hưng Thiện
description: Hưng Thiện Pagoda is a tranquil Buddhist temple offering a peaceful retreat and spiritual solace.

name: Khu du lịch sinh thái Vườn Xoài
description: The Vườn Xoài Eco-tourism Area is a lush green space where visitors can enjoy nature, farm activities, and local products.

name: Cồn Đen
description: Cồn Đen is a scenic island known for its natural beauty, offering opportunities for hiking and exploring the local ecosystem.

name: Cồn Chim
description: Cồn Chim is a peaceful destination with rich biodiversity, making it a great spot for bird-watching and nature walks.

name: Vàm Lũng
description: Vàm Lũng is a picturesque area known for its vast landscapes, traditional culture, and tranquil environment.

name: Bãi biển Nhà Mát
address: Bãi biển Nhà Mát, Bạc Liêu, Vietnam
description: Nhà Mát Beach is a popular beach destination in Bac Lieu, known for its clean sand and calm waters.

address: Chợ nổi Bạc Liêu, Bạc Liêu, Vietnam
description: Bac Lieu Floating Market is a unique market where vendors sell goods directly from their boats.
